basics.name: Jeffrey Corpuz
basics.label: Senior Staff Engineer (Platform & Infrastructure)
basics.summary: Senior Staff Engineer with 10+ years architecting and scaling high-performance distributed systems across robotics, fintech, media. Proven leader building cloud-native platforms that power ML workloads, developer velocity, and global availability. Expert in Kubernetes, Terraform, observability, CI/CD, and platform automation—focused on enabling teams to iterate and deploy resiliently at scale.

work.position: Senior Staff Engineer – Team Lead Manager
highlights: Co-led design and rollout of secure, scalable infrastructure for humanoid robotics meeting SOC 2 & GDPR compliance enabling advanced AI capabilities across edge and cloud systems.
Evolved initial Kubernetes platform into mature global foundation enabling rapid development and future multi-region deployments.
Architected global active-active cell-based infrastructure across multiple AWS regions delivering high availability, tenant isolation, and intelligent routing for fleet management.
Managed and mentored high-performing platform team driving cloud architecture, developer tooling, and security best practices to support R&D velocity.
Led creation of TDDs, ADRs, and RFCs for core initiatives driving alignment via collaborative reviews and prototypes.
Reduced on-call burden 50% through automated remediation pipelines, actionable runbooks, proactive alert signal audits.
Unified observability with OpenTelemetry, Datadog, Slack-integrated PagerDuty alerts reducing MTTR 40% and enabling distributed tracing & SLO visibility.
Founded and scaled ML Ops infrastructure delivering reproducible compute environments, interactive notebooks, scalable model serving using Kubernetes, Kubeflow, SageMaker.
Designed and built multi-cloud (AWS/GCP) self-service Kubernetes platform using ArgoCD, Helm, Terraform supporting fleet & ML workloads with >99.99% uptime.
Engineered HA and failure-resilient patterns across clusters for latency-sensitive robotic telemetry, distributed ML pipelines, real-time processing.
Translated complex robotics & ML infra requirements into scalable platform designs accelerating delivery and shaping roadmap.
Developed Go-based Kubernetes operators & automation tools enabling declarative self-service workflows reducing operational overhead.
Established internal developer platform (golden paths, guardrails) reducing onboarding time 60% and increasing velocity.
Built core CI/CD pipelines, canary workflows, ephemeral test envs forming foundation for safe rapid deployments.
Led CI/CD & GitOps architecture using ArgoCD enabling reliable reproducible builds & deployments org-wide.
Led migration from AWS ECS to EKS improving orchestration flexibility and scaling for platform services.
Migrated global platform from AWS OpsWorks to Kubernetes improving reliability and compliance posture.
Designed and implemented scalable, resilient cloud-native solutions for government applications.
Founding DevOps engineer building initial cloud infrastructure and establishing core DevOps practices.
Developed and maintained cloud infrastructure & internal tooling optimizing deployment and operational efficiency.
Led team building critical backend systems for streaming video across Android and Xbox platforms.
